includes.expression: Skin.HasSetting(FilterActive) | String.IsEqual(Container.SecondTitle,Unwatched) | [String.IsEqual(Container.SecondTitle,Recently Released) + !String.IsEqual(Container.Property(PlexFilter),newest)] | [String.IsEqual(Container.SecondTitle,Recently Added) + !String.IsEqual(Container.Property(PlexFilter),recentlyadded)] | [String.IsEqual(Container.SecondTitle,Recently Viewed) + !String.IsEqual(Container.Property(PlexFilter),recentlyviewed)] | [String.IsEqual(Container.SecondTitle,On Deck) + !String.IsEqual(Container.Property(PlexFilter),ondeck)] | String.IsEqual(Container.SecondTitle,By Collection) | String.IsEqual(Container.SecondTitle,By Genre) | String.IsEqual(Container.SecondTitle,By Year) | String.IsEqual(Container.SecondTitle,By Decade) | String.IsEqual(Container.SecondTitle,By Director) | String.IsEqual(Container.SecondTitle,By Starring Actor) | String.IsEqual(Container.SecondTitle,By Country) | String.IsEqual(Container.SecondTitle,By Content Rating) | String.IsEqual(Container.SecondTitle,By Rating) | String.IsEqual(Container.SecondTitle,By Resolution) | String.IsEqual(Container.SecondTitle,By First Letter) | [String.IsEqual(Container.SecondTitle,By Folder) + !String.IsEqual(Container.Property(PlexFilter),folder)] | [String.IsEqual(Container.SecondTitle,Recently Viewed Episodes) + !String.IsEqual(Container.Property(PlexFilter),recentlyviewed)] | [String.IsEqual(Container.SecondTitle,Recently Viewed Shows) + !String.IsEqual(Container.Property(PlexFilter),recentlyviewedshows)] | [String.IsEqual(Container.SecondTitle,All Artists) + Skin.HasSetting(FilterActive)] | [String.IsEqual(Container.SecondTitle,By Album) + Skin.HasSetting(FilterActive)] | String.IsEqual(Container.SecondTitle,By Camera Make) | String.IsEqual(Container.SecondTitle,Camera Model) | String.IsEqual(Container.SecondTitle,By Shutter Speed) | String.IsEqual(Container.SecondTitle,By ISO) | String.IsEqual(Container.SecondTitle,By Lens)
